com.here.mobility.sdk.core.utils

Class ObjectDiskBuffer<T,E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.mobility.sdk.core.utils.ObjectDiskBuffer<T,E>

  • public abstract class ObjectDiskBuffer<T,E>
extends java.lang.Object
    A buffer of generic objects stored on disk, before being uploaded to the server, by a periodic task (usually managed by ObjectUploadTask). The class is parameterized by the type of the stored objects, and by the type of additional information required for uploading the objects.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ObjectDiskBuffer(java.lang.String name, java.io.File file, com.here.mobility.sdk.common.serialization.ObjectCoder<T> coder)
      Creates a new ObjectDiskBuffer with the given name, which writes the items into the given file.

      Uploads the currently stored items, and, if successful, deletes them.
      protected abstract boolean uploadImpl(android.content.Context context, java.util.List<T> items, E extra)
      Does the actual uploading of items.
